description: Accepts a documentation website URL, extracts page content, and generates two PDF versions: a clean faithful copy and a structured compliance report with headers, metadata, and timestamps

source_url.description: The documentation URL that was processed

word_count.description: Approximate word count of extracted content

extraction_summary.description: Brief summary of what was extracted

clean_copy_info.description: Description of the clean copy PDF generated

compliance_report_info.description: Description of the compliance report PDF generated

notes: This agent returns JSON text in the response body AND generates PDF file outputs. The generated PDF files are available in module_outputs.artifact_files at the top level of the API response (not inside the JSON text). The response body contains metadata about the extraction; the actual PDFs are downloadable from the artifact_files URLs.
